title: Mars Transit in the 6th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mars transiting your sixth house channels energy into discipline, problem-solving, and daily responsibilities. The drive to overcome obstacles strengthens, making this a productive phase for tackling work pressure, competition, and health routines. You may feel compelled to confront inefficiencies or conflicts directly. While stamina increases, impatience with delays or opposition can trigger stress. When guided consciously, this transit builds resilience, sharp work ethics, and the ability to win challenges through consistent effort.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Irritation over small issues may surface.
Tendency to correct or criticize increases.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses related to work or health increase.
Focus on clearing debts or obligations.

closing: Mars in the 6th house sharpens the ability to fight challenges through effort and discipline. When energy is paced wisely, victories become sustainable.
